root.name: Ranger Mission
root.description: GameplayThe game play consists of two major modes, one consists of shooting all of the enemies in an area within a time limit or just to a set amount of kills, the other being shooting sets of enemies in the numerical order that is shown on the screen. Instead of the enemies being able to shoot at the player, if the player is not able to clear the objective he loses a life point, the maximum being two. There is also a wide variety of weapons in the game that change up the action, from standard assault rifles and sub-machine guns to grenade launchers.
